nodes.text: Alor-Wan was a male Voss Mystic during the Cold War. Alor-Wan had foreseen that the Sith Lords of the resurgent Sith Empire would destroy the Voss way of life; so when Kallig arrived on Voss, Alor-Wan send a Voss emissary named Sor-Nak to demanded that the Sith Lord turn back. The Sith Lord refused, so Sor-Nak left, stating that Alor-Wan had foreseen that they would not use force to dissuade Kallig. But nothing the Voss did stopped Kallig from a Voss mind-healing ritual to subdue four Force ghosts. It is unknown how Alor-Wan's prophecy would affect the Voss.
